profile_summary: As a Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience, I excel in **Python** development and have a solid understanding of **SQL**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and Linux environments. I specialize in backend and frontend development, utilizing frameworks and tools like **FastAPI**, **Django**, **Flask**, **Angular**, **Vue**, **React**, and **Next.js**. I have extensive experience with databases including **PostgreSQL**, ensuring optimal performance through advanced data modeling and query optimization. My robust skill set encompasses API development (REST/gRPC), data analysis, machine learning, and working with distributed systems. I thrive in building B2B SaaS solutions, focusing on microservices architecture to deliver high-performance applications tailored to evolving business needs.
